department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Installation of new roof and repair of lobby ceiling
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada needs equipment, labor, materials, and expertise for contract of Lobby Partial Roof Replacement.
full_summary:
**Invitation to Tender - Lobby Partial Roof Replacement, Fredericton, NB**
--------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4243498296-Doc4312016482

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Publication Date:** November 29, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Asturies Time)

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services (CNST)

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements:** 

+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of new 2-ply modified bitumen roofing membrane on the lobby roof and the replacement of water-damaged gypsum board ceiling in the lobby area of Building 95, located at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre.

**Project Description:**

The successful supplier will be required to:

* Supply and install the new roofing membrane
* Replace the water-damaged gypsum board ceiling
* Perform all necessary repairs and maintenance

**Project Timeline:**

The project duration is expected to be 12 weeks from the date of contract award.

**Specifications:**

The project must be performed according to the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.124854.001.

**Eligibility:**

Qualification requirements are outlined in the Solicitation Document. Suppliers are required to submit their qualifications and proposals in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the document.

**Contact Information:**

Deirdre Johnston
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Email: deirdre.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Solicitation Document:**

The solicitation documents may be downloaded from [insert URL]. Hard copy documents are not provided.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* Price
* Qualification and experience
* Technical ability to meet the specifications

**Closing Date and Time:** December 19, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Asturies Time)
